titleInfo.title: Dataset for "The Chiral Phase Transition in 3-flavor QCD from Lattice QCD"

mods.abstract: Data publication for "The Chiral Phase Transition in 3-flavor QCD from Lattice QCD", arXiv:2111.12599. Contains data for all figures shown in the publication.

subject.topic: QCD at finite temperature and density
